analyzed: sgom pa la dbang bar gyur pa'i sngags pas/_yid dang rjes su mthun pa'i
translated: A mantra practitioner who has become empowered in this meditation

analyzed: gnas gang yang rung bar/_stan bde ba la 'dug ste/_rang gi snying khar nyi ma
translated: should sit on a comfortable seat in any place that is agreeable to the mind.🔽In one's heart center is a syllable bam standing on a sun, completely🔽surrounded by a garland of light rays,

analyzed: la gnas pa'i bam yig kun nas 'od zer gyi phreng ba 'khrigs pa/_gsal bar

translated: then invite the gurus, buddhas, bodhisattvas, and the retinue of the six yoginis with the hook of light rays from that.🔽In front of them,

analyzed: dag gi mdun du sdig pa bshags pa la sogs bya'o/_/de nas sems can thams
translated: confess your misdeeds and so forth.🔽Then meditate on love, which is the wish to connect all sentient beings🔽with happiness, compassion, which is the wish to free them from suffering

analyzed: cad bde ba la sbyor ba'i byams pa dang /_sdug bsngal rgyu dang byas pa 'don par rnal 'byor ma drug gi sgrub pa'i thabs/
translated: and its causes,

analyzed: 'dod pa'i snying rje/_bde ba dang nam du'ang mi 'bral bar 'dod pa'i dga'
translated: the joy of wishing that they never be separated from happiness, and🔽equanimity, which is the wish that they be free from the stains of the

analyzed: ba dang /_nyon mongs pa dang /_nye ba'i nyon mongs pas ma gos par 'dod pa'i btang snyoms sgom par bya'o/_/de nas brtan g.yo sna tshhogs su snang ba'i
translated: afflictions and the branch afflictions.🔽Then, when you investigate all🔽entities that appear as the various animate and inanimate worlds, they are

original: dngos po thams cad rtags na/_rnam par dben pa sgyu ma lta bu'i don can du
analyzed: dngos po thams cad rtags na/_rnam par dben pa sgyu ma lta bu'i don can du
translated: empty.

original: rig par byas la/_swa b+ha ba shud d+ha sarba d+harma swa b+ha ba shud+ho\u0f85 ham/_zhes🔽brjod pas brtan par bya'o/_/de nas snying kha'i sa bon gyi 'od zer gyis bdag
analyzed: rig par byas la/_swa b+ha ba shud d+ha sarba d+harma swa b+ha ba shud+ho\u0f85 ham/_zhes brjod pas brtan par bya'o/_/de nas snying kha'i sa bon gyi 'od zer gyis bdag
translated: say svabhāva śuddha sarvadharma svabhāva śuddho ’haṃ.🔽By saying that, it is stabilized.

original: dang khams gsum pa thams cad thig le'i rnam par byas la/_om shu n+ya ta dz+nya na🔽badzra swa b+ha ba ad+ma ko\u0f85_ham/_zhes pa'i sngags kyi don mngon du byas pas snang ba
analyzed: dang khams gsum pa thams cad thig le'i rnam par byas la/_om shu n+ya ta dz+nya na badzra swa b+ha ba ad+ma ko\u0f85_ham/_zhes pa'i sngags kyi don mngon du byas pas snang ba
translated: Then, the light rays from the seed syllable in the heart make oneself and all of the three realms in the aspect of bindus.🔽Say oṃ śūnyatā jñāna vajra svabhāva ātmako ’haṃ.

original: med pa'i de kho na nyid la mnyam par gzhag go/_/de nas sngon gyi smon lam
analyzed: med pa'i de kho na nyid la mnyam par gzhag go/_/de nas sngon gyi smon lam
translated: By actualizing the meaning of the mantra, rest in the nonappearance of reality.

original: rjes su dran pa dang /_nam mkhar gnas pa'i ram yig las nyi ma/_de'i steng
analyzed: rjes su dran pa dang /_nam mkhar gnas pa'i ram yig las nyi ma/_de'i steng
translated: Then, recall the previous aspiration and the syllable raṃ in the sky becomes the sun.🔽Upon that, from the syllable hūṃ, there is a vajra.

original: du hum gi yi ge las rdo rje/_de'i lte bar nyi ma la gnas pa'i hum/_de'i 'od zer
analyzed: du hum gi yi ge las rdo rje/_de'i lte bar nyi ma la gnas pa'i hum/_de'i 'od zer
translated: In its center, upon a sun, is hūṃ.🔽Its light rays create the six vajra fences and so on.

original: gyis rdo rje'i ra ba la sogs pa drug byas la/_der e yig las yang dag par
analyzed: gyis rdo rje'i ra ba la sogs pa drug byas la/_der e yig las yang dag par
translated: In that, from the syllable e, a perfect

original: byung ba'i chos 'byung gi nang du/_yo ram bam mam sum/_'og nas 'byung ba'i kha
analyzed: byung ba'i chos 'byung gi nang du/_yo ram bam mam sum/_'og nas 'byung ba'i kha
translated: which are the colors of the🔽wind, fire, water, and earth,🔽the wind mandala arises from YAM,

original: dog can las/_rlung dang /_me dang /_chu dang /_dbang chen dang /_ri
analyzed: dog can las/_rlung dang /_me dang /_chu dang /_dbang chen dang /_ri
translated: the fire mandala arises from RAM,🔽the water mandala arises from VAM,🔽and the gold mandala arises from SUM.

original: rab lhun po/_sngo dmar dkar ser/_sna tshhogs pa'i mdog du snang ba/
analyzed: rab lhun po/_sngo dmar dkar ser/_sna tshhogs pa'i mdog du snang ba/
translated: The wind mandala is blue, the fire mandala is red, the water mandala is white, and the gold mandala is yellow.🔽The wind mandala is shaped like a bow, the fire mandala is triangular, the water mandala is round, and the gold mandala is square.

original: gzhu lta bu dang /_gru gsum/_zlum po/_gru bzhi/_rtshe mo brgyad kyis nye bar
analyzed: gzhu lta bu dang /_gru gsum/_zlum po/_gru bzhi/_rtshe mo brgyad kyis nye bar
translated: The wind mandala is supported by the eight nāḍīs.

original: mdzes pa sgom mo/_/ri bo mchog gi steng gnas pa'i/_/sna tshhogs pad 'dab
analyzed: mdzes pa sgom mo/_/ri bo mchog gi steng gnas pa'i/_/sna tshhogs pad 'dab
translated: On top of Mount Sumeru,🔽there are thirty-two variegated lotus petals.🔽On top of that is a variegated vajra.

original: sum cu gnyis/_/de steng sna tshhogs rdo rje'o/_/lte bar bru yig yongs gyur las/_/
analyzed: sum cu gnyis/_/de steng sna tshhogs rdo rje'o/_/lte bar bru yig yongs gyur las/_/
translated: In the center, the syllable BHRŪM completely transforms🔽into a multistoried palace made of the five precious gems,

original: khang rtshegs rin chen lnga rang bzhin/_/gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa/_/twa ra na
analyzed: khang rtshegs rin chen lnga rang bzhin/_/gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa/_/twa ra na
translated: with four sides and four doors,🔽adorned with four toraṇas,🔽and beautified with eight pillars.

original: bzhis rnam par brgyan/_/ka ba brgyad kyis nye bar mdzes/_/gzungs kyi lha
analyzed: bzhis rnam par brgyan/_/ka ba brgyad kyis nye bar mdzes/_/gzungs kyi lha
translated: The dhāraṇī goddesses are arranged

original: mo 'khod pa'o/_/stag bu bzhi dang yang dag ldan/_/rgyan steng la sogs
analyzed: mo 'khod pa'o/_/stag bu bzhi dang yang dag ldan/_/rgyan steng la sogs
translated: on top of the railings and so on.

original: bdun dang ldan/_/ba dan bcu gnyis sbyangs 'khrol ba'o/_/de'i nang du pad+ma
analyzed: bdun dang ldan/_/ba dan bcu gnyis sbyangs 'khrol ba'o/_/de'i nang du pad+ma
translated: It has seven layers, and the wind blows the twelve banners.🔽In the center of that, from a five-petaled lotus,

original: 'dab ma lnga pa'i lte bar/_a li ka li las/_zla nyi'i dbus su/_bam yig
analyzed: 'dab ma lnga pa'i lte bar/_a li ka li las/_zla nyi'i dbus su/_bam yig
translated: in the center of the sun and moon, the syllable vaṃ

original: las yang dag par mtshhan pa'i gri gug bam yig gis mtshhan pa'o/_/de las 'od spro🔽ba dang sdu ba sngon du song ba'i cig du yongs su 'dres pa las/_lha mo'i 'khor
analyzed: las yang dag par mtshhan pa'i gri gug bam yig gis mtshhan pa'o/_/de las 'od spro ba dang sdu ba sngon du song ba'i cig du yongs su 'dres pa las/_lha mo'i 'khor
translated: is fully marked with a flaying knife marked with the syllable vaṃ.🔽Light radiates from that and returns, and the two completely melt into one another.🔽The complete wheel of the goddess is seen

original: lo yongs su rdzogs par lta ba ni/_pad steng nyi gdan la gnas pa'i/_/rdo rje
analyzed: lo yongs su rdzogs par lta ba ni/_pad steng nyi gdan la gnas pa'i/_/rdo rje
translated: upon a lotus and sun seat, Vajravārāhī,

original: phag mo rab 'jigs ma/_/mdog dmar zhal gsum phyag drug te/_/rtsha ba sku
analyzed: phag mo rab 'jigs ma/_/mdog dmar zhal gsum phyag drug te/_/rtsha ba sku
translated: very frightening, red, with three faces and six arms,🔽the middle body and head🔽are yellow and green.

original: dang 'tshhungs pa la/_/gzhan gnyis ser dang ljang ba'o/_/g.yas g.yon phyag
analyzed: dang 'tshhungs pa la/_/gzhan gnyis ser dang ljang ba'o/_/g.yas g.yon phyag
translated: The right and left hands🔽hold a flaying knife, skull, iron hook,🔽skull cup, khaṭvāṅga staff, and lasso, respectively.

original: gis go rims bzhin/_/gri gug tshhangs mgo lcags kyu dang /_/thod pa kha :zhags pa snams/_/'dab ma rnams la mdun ngos nas/_/lugs bzlog pa'i
analyzed: gis go rims bzhin/_/gri gug tshhangs mgo lcags kyu dang /_/thod pa kha :zhags pa snams/_/'dab ma rnams la mdun ngos nas/_/lugs bzlog pa'i
translated: On the petals, beginning in the front,🔽in reverse order,

original: rnal 'byor pa'i/_/a li ni dang rmongs byed ma/_/skyed byed skrag byed rtshag di
analyzed: rnal 'byor pa'i/_/a li ni dang rmongs byed ma/_/skyed byed skrag byed rtshag di
translated: The yoginīs are Ālinī, Mohinī, Jālinī, Bhīminī, and Carcinī.

original: ka_/in+di la kun rta dang /_/gser dang mar gad du ba'i mdog_/kun
analyzed: ka_/in+di la kun rta dang /_/gser dang mar gad du ba'i mdog_/kun
translated: They are the colors of indigo, horse, gold, and madder.

original: kyang zhal gcig phyag gnyis te/_/g.yas g.yon phyag gis rims bzhin du/
analyzed: kyang zhal gcig phyag gnyis te/_/g.yas g.yon phyag gis rims bzhin du/
translated: All of them have one face and two arms.

original: rdo rje gri gug da ma ru/_/thod pa kha tam 'dzin pa'o/_/phag mo la sogs lha
analyzed: rdo rje gri gug da ma ru/_/thod pa kha tam 'dzin pa'o/_/phag mo la sogs lha
translated: The right and left hands hold a vajra, flaying knife, and ḍamaru, skull cup, and khaṭvāṅga.🔽All of the deities, such as Vārāhī, stand with the right leg straight.

original: rnams kun/_/g.yas rkyang zhabs kyis yang dag bzhugs/_/spyan gsum skra ni
analyzed: rnams kun/_/g.yas rkyang zhabs kyis yang dag bzhugs/_/spyan gsum skra ni
translated: They have three eyes, and their hair is loose.

original: grol ba ste/_/lang tshho gzhon zhing 'gying bag can/_/phyag rgya lnga yis rgyan pa'i🔽sku/_/dum bu ka rags byas pa'o/_/de ltar dam tshhig gi dkyil 'khor yongs🔽su rdzogs par byas la/_gtsho mo la ye shes kyi ngo bor byin rlabs pa dang /_sku
analyzed: grol ba ste/_/lang tshho gzhon zhing 'gying bag can/_/phyag rgya lnga yis rgyan pa'i sku/_/dum bu ka rags byas pa'o/_/de ltar dam tshhig gi dkyil 'khor yongs su rdzogs par byas la/_gtsho mo la ye shes kyi ngo bor byin rlabs pa dang /_sku
translated: They are youthful, voluptuous, and adorned with the five symbolic ornaments.🔽Their bodies are smeared with ash.🔽Having completed the entire pledge wheel in that way, the consecration of the gnosis beings into the pledge beings and the consecration of the body, speech, and mind are performed.

original: gsung thugs byin rlabs pa dang /_lus kyi gnas drug du go cha bgo ba sngon song
analyzed: gsung thugs byin rlabs pa dang /_lus kyi gnas drug du go cha bgo ba sngon song
translated: The armoring of the six places is done beforehand.

original: bas/_dkyil 'khor thams cad la ye shes pa gzhug pa dang /_dbang skur
analyzed: bas/_dkyil 'khor thams cad la ye shes pa gzhug pa dang /_dbang skur
translated: Therefore, you should perform the complete ritual of inviting the wisdom beings into all the maṇḍalas, conferring empowerment,

original: ba dang mchod stod bdud rtshi myang ba'i mthun pa'i cho ga rnams rdzogs par bya'o/_/
analyzed: ba dang mchod stod bdud rtshi myang ba'i mthun pa'i cho ga rnams rdzogs par bya'o/_/
translated: making offerings, and tasting the elixir.

original: skyo bar gyur na bzlas pa bya ste/_snying khar gnas pa'i sngags kyi phreng ba la rtshe🔽rnal 'byor ma drug gi sgrub pa'i thabs
analyzed: skyo bar gyur na bzlas pa bya ste/_snying khar gnas pa'i sngags kyi phreng ba la rtshe rnal 'byor ma drug gi sgrub pa'i thabs
translated: If you become tired, perform the recitation:

original: gcig pas ngag du brjod par bya'o/_/de la sngags ni 'di yin te/_om bam/
analyzed: gcig pas ngag du brjod par bya'o/_/de la sngags ni 'di yin te/_om bam/
translated: the mantra garland that resides in the heart is recited by the single one.🔽The mantra is: oṃ vaṃ🔽hi oṃ🔽hi loṃ🔽hri hrīḥ

original: hi om/_hi long /_hri hri/_hum hu~m phat phat/_ces pa'o/_/gal te bzlas🔽pas kyang skyo bar gyur na/_lha'i 'khor lo snying kha'i sa bon la bsdus la/_bam
analyzed: hi om/_hi long /_hri hri/_hum hu~m phat phat/_ces pa'o/_/gal te bzlas pas kyang skyo bar gyur na/_lha'i 'khor lo snying kha'i sa bon la bsdus la/_bam
translated: huṃ huṃ phaṭ phaṭ🔽If you become tired even by the recitation, the maṇḍala of deities is gathered into the seed syllable in the heart, and from vaṃ

original: gyur pa las/_lha'i gzugs kyi ci bde ba'i spyod pas gnas so/_/thun
analyzed: gyur pa las/_lha'i gzugs kyi ci bde ba'i spyod pas gnas so/_/thun
translated: one becomes a deity.

original: 'tshhams gzhan du ni bdud rtshi bam la bsdus ste bam gyur pa las/_dkyil 'khor pa
analyzed: 'tshhams gzhan du ni bdud rtshi bam la bsdus ste bam gyur pa las/_dkyil 'khor pa
translated: In other sessions, after gathering the elixir into vaṃ, from vaṃ🔽one becomes a deity.

original: rnams mngon par sprul la/_dbang skur ba nas bdud rtshi myang ba'i bar gyi cho ga
analyzed: rnams mngon par sprul la/_dbang skur ba nas bdud rtshi myang ba'i bar gyi cho ga
translated: and emanate the deities.🔽🔽The ritual from the empowerment up to the tasting of the elixir is the same.

original: thams cad snga ma bzhin du sgoms pas bzlas pa dang mthun par bya'o/_/thun
analyzed: thams cad snga ma bzhin du sgoms pas bzlas pa dang mthun par bya'o/_/thun
translated: Having emanated the deities, perform the entire ritual from the empowerment up to the tasting of the elixir as before.

original: bzhi pa la ye shes pa gshegs pa dang /_rten dang brten pa ma lus par bsdus
analyzed: bzhi pa la ye shes pa gshegs pa dang /_rten dang brten pa ma lus par bsdus
translated: In the fourth session, the awareness beings depart, and you dissolve everything, both the support and the supported,

original: ste/_stan mi rtogs pa'i ting 'dzin gyis gnyid la brtags par bya'o/_/rnal
analyzed: ste/_stan mi rtogs pa'i ting 'dzin gyis gnyid la brtags par bya'o/_/rnal
translated: and examine your sleep with the samādhi of nonconceptual sitting.🔽Whatever merit I have gained

original: 'byor ma drug sgrub pa'i thabs/_mdor bsdus bkod pas bsod nams gang
analyzed: 'byor ma drug sgrub pa'i thabs/_mdor bsdus bkod pas bsod nams gang
translated: by composing this brief arrangement,🔽may all beings without exception

original: thob des 'gro kun ma lus pa/_sgrib bral sangs rgyas gnas thob shog_/rnal
analyzed: thob des 'gro kun ma lus pa/_sgrib bral sangs rgyas gnas thob shog_/rnal
translated: attain the state of buddhahood, free from obscurations.🔽The Sādhana of the Six Yoginīs

original: 'byor ma drug gi sgrub thabs/_pan+di ta su ma kirti dang /_kastis mdzad pa🔽rdzogs so//_/// rgya gar gyi mkhan po su ma kirti dang /_lotsh+tshha ba mar pa chos kyi dbang phyug
analyzed: 'byor ma drug gi sgrub thabs/_pan+di ta su ma kirti dang /_kastis mdzad pa rdzogs so//_/// rgya gar gyi mkhan po su ma kirti dang /_lotsh+tshha ba mar pa chos kyi dbang phyug
translated: was composed by the paṇḍita Sumāgirti and Kṣiti.

original: gis bsgyur ba'o//
analyzed: gis bsgyur ba'o//
translated: It is complete.🔽It was translated by the Indian abbot Sumāgirti and the Tibetan translator Lotsāwa Marpa Chökyi Wangchuk.
